title: Sunrise profession: land degradation hypothetical
creator_credit: John Nairn, John Nicholson and La Trobe University
brief_description: Part 1. An introduction to the School of Agriculture courses at La Trobe University, highlighting hi-tech science, state of the art facilities, applied problem solving, global issues, real world economics, innovative teaching and breakthough research. Part 2. An agricultural hypothetical teaching exercise on land degradation dealing with the salinity problems in northern Victoria.
